definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The networked control system with packet losses is described as jump system.
sentences.chinese: 將存在數據丟包的網絡控制系統描述爲跳躍系統。

sentences.english: The third day of the Dai brothers and sisters are so glade to loss the game.
sentences.chinese: 第三天，傣族的哥哥姐姐們都到林間空地做丟包遊戲。

sentences.english: In this case, the data transmission will be empty, resulting in packet loss.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，數據的傳輸就會出現空洞，造成丟包。

sentences.english: The aim is also focused on the playback quantity which may be influenced by loss of information of the playing video frame.
sentences.chinese: 同時也關注由於丟包而引起的回放質量的下降問題。

pinyin: xu1 ni3 zhuan1 yong4 wang3 luo4

definition: (of a guitar, kite etc) to have a string break/(of a tradition etc) to be discontinued/(telephone or Internet connection) disconnected/cut off
to ignore/to brush off/to dismiss/to pay no attention to
(of police etc) to stop (sb) for inspection/to pull (sb) over
